name: ARMED SEVEN
description: The year is 1989. 12 years have passed since the Gogoh Army’s invasion of Earth. Exposure to alien technology during the war enabled Earth’s own technologies to take massive leaps forward. International conflict that was previously rife in the history of mankind fell to an all-time low, and the Earth Federation was established as a...
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 2000/XP/7 Processor: Intel Pentium3 1GHz or better Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 8.1 or above and Direct3D with 64MB or more of VRAM Storage: 110 MB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
